citations.narrative:
A current inventory was not available at time of USDA inspection . It is important to have an accessible inventory available
at time of the inspection to ensure all animals are accounted for on the inspection . Each dealer and exhibitor must keep
and maintain records in their possession that include information on acquisition /disposition and offspring born of any
animal in their possession .
CORRECT BY : 7/15/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager .
Additional Inspectors :
Lynh Ly , Veterinary Medical Officer
